com.acrolinx.javasdk.api.extraction

Interface DocumentBuilder<SUBCLASS_TYPE extends DocumentBuilder<SUBCLASS_TYPE,DOCUMENT_TYPE>,DOCUMENT_TYPE extends Document>

  • Type Parameters:
    SUBCLASS_TYPE - The type of the sub class. Used to return the correct type while chaining.
    DOCUMENT_TYPE - The type of the Document.
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    BlockDocumentBuilder<KeyType>, StringDocumentBuilder
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDocumentBuilder, BlockDocumentBuilderImpl, StreamDocumentBuilder, StringDocumentBuilderImpl

    public interface DocumentBuilder<SUBCLASS_TYPE extends DocumentBuilder<SUBCLASS_TYPE,DOCUMENT_TYPE>,DOCUMENT_TYPE extends Document>
    A DocumentBuilder is used to build a Document. This is the root interface.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DOCUMENT_TYPE build() 
      SUBCLASS_TYPE withAuthor(Author author) 
      SUBCLASS_TYPE withFileFormat(FileFormat fileformat) 
      SUBCLASS_TYPE withFileName(FileName filename) 
      SUBCLASS_TYPE withSoftSkipping(boolean isSoftSkipping) 

    • Method Detail

      • build

        DOCUMENT_TYPE build()

      • withFileName

        SUBCLASS_TYPE withFileName(FileName filename)
        Parameters:
        filename - The FileName of the Document. Use Filenames.filenameFrom(String) to create one.
        Returns:
        the DocumentBuilder itself.

      • withAuthor

        SUBCLASS_TYPE withAuthor(Author author)
        Parameters:
        author - The Author of the Document. Use Authors.newAuthor(String) to create one.
        Returns:
        the DocumentBuilder itself.

      • withFileFormat

        SUBCLASS_TYPE withFileFormat(FileFormat fileformat)
        Parameters:
        fileformat - The FileFormat of the Document. Use FileFormats to create one.
        Returns:
        the DocumentBuilder itself.

      • withSoftSkipping

        SUBCLASS_TYPE withSoftSkipping(boolean isSoftSkipping)
        Parameters:
        isSoftSkipping - True if soft skipping is used. If soft skipping is used excluded text will also be sent to Acrolinx Server, but marked by ControlCharacter.SKIPPED_ELEMENT_START and ControlCharacter.SKIPPED_ELEMENT_END. No flags will appear in excluded text anyway.
        Returns:
        the DocumentBuilder itself.
